summary.incident:
The game is interrupted as Darlin Yongwa
(Lorient) is sent off by the referee.

Goal! Mason Greenwood (Marseille) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Yvon Mvogo into the bottom
left corner.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Noah Cadiou walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Arsene Kouassi (Lorient).

The resulting corner is whipped in by Mason
Greenwood and Benjamin Pavard (Marseille)
is left unmarked to plant a precise header
into the top of the net. The score is 2:0.
It's a yellow card for Benjamin Pavard (Marseille).

Goal! Angel Gomes (Marseille) picks up the
ball from a rebound and from the edge of
the box he unleashes a shot into the top
left corner. 3:0.

The referee signals a substitution. Matt
O'Riley (Marseille) is brought on as a substitute
for Amine Gouiri.

Thomas Leonard shows a yellow card to Angel
Gomes (Marseille) for his blatant foul.

What was Dermane Karim (Lorient) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Emerson (Marseille) is replacing Facundo
Medina.

Roberto De Zerbi decides to make a substitution.
Geoffrey Kondogbia will be replaced by Pierre-Emile
Hojbjerg (Marseille).

Timothy Weah comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Igor Paixao (Marseille).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Theo Le Bris (Lorient) comes
onto the pitch for Dermane Karim.

Here is a change. Sambou Soumano is going
off and Olivier Pantaloni gives the last
tactical orders to Mohamed Bamba (Lorient).

Substitution. Jean-Victor Makengo leaves
the pitch and is replaced by Arthur Avom
(Lorient).

Abdoulaye Faye (Lorient) receives a yellow
card for a nasty tackle.

The substitution has been made. Aiyegun
Tosin (Lorient) has replaced Joel Mvuka
Mugisha.

Roberto De Zerbi prepares a substitution.
Benjamin Pavard is replaced by Arthur Vermeeren
(Marseille).

That's a clear yellow card. Igor Paixao
(Marseille) goes into the book.

Goal! Arthur Vermeeren sets up Nayef Aguerd
(Marseille) for a shot on the edge of the
box. He doesn't hit the cleanest of shots,
but the ball somehow finds its way into
the bottom right corner. 4:0.

Abner Vinicius (Lyon) receives a yellow
card from the referee as expected.

CJ Egan-Riley (Marseille) takes out his
opponent with an awful tackle and is shown
a red card by the referee!

The manager is forced to make a substitution
due to a red card. Roberto De Zerbi issues
instructions to Derek Cornelius (Marseille),
who will replace Bilal Nadir.

Today's referee Francois Letexier rightly
decides to book Angel Gomes (Marseille)
for his harsh tackle.

Roberto De Zerbi makes a half-time substitution.
Ulisses Garcia comes on in place of Mason
Greenwood (Marseille).

Jorge Maciel is forced to make a change.
Malick Fofana (Lyon) is not able to carry
on due to injury. He is replaced by Nicolas
Tagliafico.

Jorge Maciel has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Afonso Moreira (Lyon) replacing
Abner Vinicius.

That will be all from Khalis Merah who is
being replaced by the fresh legs of Pavel
Sulc (Lyon).

Substitution. Timothy Weah makes his way
off the pitch and Pol Lirola (Marseille)
comes on as his replacement.

Pavel Sulc (Lyon) has tested the patience
of referee Francois Letexier and goes into
the book for a previous late challenge.

Roberto De Zerbi has decided to make a change.
Robinio Vaz (Marseille) replaces Pierre-Emerick
Aubameyang.

Hamed Junior Traore (Marseille) is being
substituted because of an injury. Roberto
De Zerbi sends Darryl Bakola on the pitch.

That's the end of the game for Adam Karabec,
who is replaced by Ruben Kluivert (Lyon).

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Michael Murillo (Marseille) duly receives
a yellow card.

Jerome Brisard shows a yellow card to Antoine
Mendy (Nice) for his blatant foul.

What a clinical finish! Fode Doucoure (Le
Havre) does superbly to meet a cross and
fires from close range. The ball goes in
off the left post, leaving the goalkeeper
beaten. Absolutely fantastic!

Hicham Boudaoui (Nice) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Jerome Brisard had an
easy-decision to make.

Kojo Peprah (Nice) receives the ball inside
the box, reacts quickly and without any
problems stabs the ball into the top left
corner.

Juma Bah (Nice) violates the laws of the
game and is shown a deserved yellow card
by the referee.

The referee is firm and issues Issa Soumare
(Le Havre) a deserved yellow card.

The substitution has been made. Sofiane
Diop (Nice) has replaced Salis Abdul Samed.

Franck Haise has decided to substitute Isak
Jansson and he is replaced by Jonathan Clauss
(Nice).

The ball finds its way to Rassoul Ndiaye
(Le Havre) after a confusing situation inside
the goalmouth. He finds some space and easily
knocks the ball in with his body and alters
the score to 2:1.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rassoul Ndiaye departs the
field of play to be replaced by Abdoulaye
Toure (Le Havre).

Here is a change. Yanis Zouaoui is going
off and Didier Digard gives the last tactical
orders to Thomas Delaine (Le Havre).

Here comes a substitution. Yassine Kechta
is given a rest as he is replaced by Felix
Mambimbi (Le Havre).

Franck Haise decides to make a substitution.
Jeremie Boga (Nice) will be replaced by
Terem Moffi.

Franck Haise has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Bernard Nguene (Nice) replacing
Antoine Mendy.

Franck Haise has decided to make a change.
Morgan Sanson (Nice) replaces Tom Louchet.

Substitution. Younes Namli (Le Havre) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Fode Doucoure walks
off.

Substitution. Ally Samatta makes way for
Simon Ebonog (Le Havre).

Issa Soumare (Le Havre) scores as he latches
on to a pass on the edge of the box and
unleashes a perfect strike that goes behind
the goalkeeper.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Kevin (Nice) was quite harsh and Jerome
Brisard didn't hesitate to show him a yellow
card.

Goal! Mike Penders makes a huge mistake
and Maghnes Akliouche (Monaco) has an easy
task to put the ball into the back of the
net. 1:0.

The referee is firm and issues Ismael Doukoure
(Strasbourg) a deserved yellow card.

The goal by Strasbourg is DISALLOWED on
the advice of the video assistant referee
due to an offside.

Liam Rosenior makes a switch. Dilane Bakwa
is coming on in place of Ismael Doukoure
(Strasbourg) at the start of the second
period.

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Abdoul Ouattara
(Strasbourg) comes off for Kendry Paez.

GOAL! A great pass finds Folarin Balogun
(Monaco) in acres of space after a fine
counter attack. He brings the ball under
control before firing it past the helpless
keeper from close range. It’s now 2:0.

The manager makes a subsitution with Samir
El Mourabet (Strasbourg) coming on for Mathis
Amougou.

Here is a change. Diego Moreira is going
off and Liam Rosenior gives the last tactical
orders to Samuel Amo-Ameyaw (Strasbourg).

What a goal! Samuel Amo-Ameyaw plays it
to Dilane Bakwa (Strasbourg), who finds
himself unmarked inside the box and slots
a first-time shot past Lukas Hradecky into
the right side of the goal. 2:1.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Joaquin Panichelli (Strasbourg) low into
the right of the net, giving goalkeeper
Lukas Hradecky no chance!

We are about to witness a subsitution. Aladji
Bamba (Monaco) for Lamine Camara.

Adi Hutter has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with George Ilenikhena (Monaco) replacing
Mika Biereth.

Adi Hutter is forced to make a change. Lukas
Hradecky is unable to continue due to injury,
Philipp Kohn (Monaco) comes on.

A substitution has been made. Aleksandr
Golovin is replaced by Takumi Minamino (Monaco).

Substitution. Rabby Nzingoula (Strasbourg)
on for Felix Lemarechal.

Goal! A great cross from Maghnes Akliouche
finds Takumi Minamino (Monaco), who scores
with a simple header into an empty net.
3:2.

Rabby Nzingoula (Strasbourg) reacts stupidly
and the referee shows him a deserved red
card!

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Folarin Balogun as
he is replaced by Mamadou Coulibaly (Monaco).

The game is interrupted. Mamadou Coulibaly
(Monaco) is given a yellow card. He has
to be more careful now.

Maghnes Akliouche (Monaco) receives a yellow
card from the referee as expected.

Gauthier Hein produces a cross from the
resulting corner and finds Sadibou Sane
(Metz) inside the box. He pulls the trigger
and scores, sending the ball into the top
right corner. What a brilliant finish. 0:1.

Sadibou Sane (Metz) gives the referee no
choice but to show him a yellow card.

Goal! Ilan Kebbal (Paris FC) puts the ball
into the bottom right corner past the outstretched
arm of Jonathan Fischer.

Ilan Kebbal (Paris FC) meets a perfect cross
from Moses Simon deep inside the box, and
he produces an accurate strike which goes
into the bottom right corner. He makes it
2:1.

Goal! It's a catastrophic error from the
opponent which has gifted a chance to Boubacar
Traore (Metz), who rolls the ball into the
back of the net from close range. 2:2.

Substitution. Georgiy Tsitaishvili makes
way for Morgan Bokele Mputu (Metz).

Stephane Le Mignan has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Ibou Sane (Metz) replacing
Giorgi Abuashvili.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Pierre Lees-Melou (Paris
FC) will replace Adama Camara.

Here is a change. Willem Geubbels is going
off and Stephane Gilli gives the last tactical
orders to Jean-Philippe Krasso (Paris FC).

GOAL! Maxime Lopez finds himself with the
ball at his feet in space after a lightning
counter attack. He looks and up slides the
ball to Moses Simon (Paris FC), who coolly
slots the ball past the keeper from close
in. It’s 3:2.

Otavio (Paris FC) receives a yellow card
from the referee as expected.

Thibault De Smet has picked up an injury
and is replaced by Nhoa Sangui (Paris FC).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Alpha Toure (Metz) is coming
onto the pitch as Terry Yegbe cannot continue
after picking up an injury.

Sadibou Sane (Metz) reacts stupidly and
the referee shows him a deserved red card!

It's time for a substitution. Jessy Deminguet
(Metz) comes on in place of Boubacar Traore.

The manager makes a subsitution with Nouha
Dicko (Paris FC) coming on for Moses Simon.

Stephane Gilli prepares a substitution.
Vincent Marchetti is replaced by Mathieu
Cafaro (Paris FC).

That's the end of the game for Idrissa Gueye,
who is replaced by Brian Madjo (Metz).

Goal! Esteban Lepaul (Rennes) finds himself
some space inside the box to get on the
end of a pass from Quentin Merlin, then
sends the ball into the bottom right corner.
0:1.

The main referee, Marc Bollengier, is apparently
not going to tolerate any discussions. Yassine
Belkhdim (Angers) is given a yellow card
for dissent.

A yellow card for a tackle by Jeremy Jacquet
(Rennes). Marc Bollengier doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Today's referee Marc Bollengier rightly
decides to book Przemyslaw Frankowski (Rennes)
for his harsh tackle.

The game is interrupted because of a yellow
card that is shown to Sidiki Cherif (Angers).

Yassine Belkhdim shows his great technique
and produces a beautiful cross into the
box. Prosper Peter (Angers) gets on the
scoresheet by heading the ball precisely
inside the right post. It's now 1:1.

Here's the change. Mousa Tamari leaves the
pitch and Mohamed Meite (Rennes) comes on
as a substitute.

Louis Mouton comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Marius Courcoul (Angers).

Alexandre Dujeux has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Jim Allevinah (Angers)
replacing Sidiki Cherif.

The manager makes a subsitution with Lanroy
Machine (Angers) coming on for Prosper Peter.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Mikayil Faye (Rennes)
is coming onto the pitch as Lilian Brassier
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Habib Beye prepares a substitution. Esteban
Lepaul is replaced by Fabian Rieder (Rennes).

Djaoui Cisse (Rennes) joins the action as
a substitute, replacing Seko Fofana.

Substitution. Ludovic Blas will be replaced
by Bertug Yildirim (Rennes).

GOAL! But maybe a bit lucky, as a miscued
scissor kick inside the box from Joao Neves
(PSG) squirms into the net somehow. That
changes the score to 0:1.

Bradley Barcola (PSG) changes the scoreline
after getting on the end of a brilliant
pass and firing a precise shot that goes
inside the right post!

What a GOAL that is! Joao Neves (PSG) showed
great determination to get to the ball inside
the box and acrobatically launched himself
into the air and produced a scissor kick
of the highest quality to leave Guillaume
Restes helpless. He makes it 0:3.

Ousmane Dembele (PSG) takes the penalty
and scores! He buries the ball into the
bottom right corner!

Goal! A rebound wrong foots everyone except
Charlie Cresswell (Toulouse), and he slams
the ball into the open net from close range.
1:4.

Cristian Casseres (Toulouse) fails to beat
the goalkeeper from the penalty spot with
a shot into the middle of the goal. Lucas
Chevalier anticipates his intention perfectly,
though, and just stays where he is to stop
his effort.

Substitution. Nuno Mendes will be replaced
by Willian Pacho (PSG).

Luis Enrique has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Warren Zaire-Emery (PSG) replacing
Vitinha.

Goal! Guillaume Restes gets a hand on the
penalty from Ousmane Dembele (PSG), but
can't stop it from flying into the bottom
right corner.

Luis Enrique has decided to make a change.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (PSG) replaces Desire
Doue.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Rasmus Nicolaisen walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Warren Kamanzi (Toulouse).

Djibril Sidibe goes off the pitch and Noah
Edjouma (Toulouse) comes on.

Mario Sauer will be replaced by Alexis Vossah
(Toulouse).

Problems for Luis Enrique as Ousmane Dembele
is not able to play anymore. His injury
is too serious and Goncalo Ramos (PSG) replaces
him.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Frank Magri will be replaced by Santiago
Hidalgo (Toulouse).

The manager makes a subsitution with Ibrahim
Mbaye (PSG) coming on for Bradley Barcola.

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet
of Joao Neves (PSG) just outside the box.
He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant
shot into the top right corner. His attempt
was beyond the reach of Guillaume Restes,
so the score changes to 1:6.

Substitution. Dayann Methalie walks off
the pitch and Seny Koumbassa (Toulouse)
comes on as a substitute.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Aron Donnum (Toulouse) was quite harsh
and Eric Wattellier didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Yann Gboho (Toulouse) has a great chance
inside the box and puts the ball into the
back of the net.

Goal! Santiago Hidalgo tees up Alexis Vossah
(Toulouse) on the edge of the box and he
fires the ball into the bottom right corner.
3:6.

GOAL! Mostafa Mohamed (Nantes) collects
a pass and from inside the box he lifts
the ball over Theo De Percin, who was off
his line. What a finish that is! 1:0.

Chidozie Awaziem (Nantes) infringed the
rules and goes into the book. Stephanie
Frappart pulls out a yellow card.

The whistle blows and Lassine Sinayoko (Auxerre)
is booked for an infringement.

Kevin Danois (Auxerre) is awarded a yellow
card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to
agree with the decision, but Stephanie Frappart
ignores the protests.

Substitution. Louis Leroux (Nantes) on for
Hyun-Seok Hong.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Bahereba Guirassy trots
off the pitch and is replaced by Matthis
Abline (Nantes).

Luis Castro has decided to substitute Francis
Coquelin and he is replaced by Hyeok-Kyu
Kwon (Nantes).

Substitution. Lasso Coulibaly (Auxerre)
replaces Josue Casimir.

Substitution. Francisco Sierralta did his
best and is replaced by Oussama El Azzouzi
(Auxerre).

Here's the change. Ibrahim Osman leaves
the pitch and Fredrik Oppegard (Auxerre)
comes on as a substitute.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Gideon Mensah leaves the
pitch and Theo Bair (Auxerre) comes on.

It will be a substitution. Dehmaine Tabibou
(Nantes) is ready to enter the pitch as
Yassine Benhattab walks off.

Luis Castro decides to make a substitution.
Mostafa Mohamed will be replaced by Amady
Camara (Nantes).

That will be a yellow card for one of the
players. The one who gets booked is Oussama
El Azzouzi (Auxerre).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Elisha Owusu departs the
field of play to be replaced by Rudy Matondo
(Auxerre).

The game has come to an end for Panos Katseris.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Joel Mvuka Mugisha (Lorient).

Arthur Avom (Lorient) has to be very careful
for the rest of the match after receiving
a yellow card from the referee for a bad
tackle on an opponent.

Abdoulaye Faye (Lorient) is shown a yellow
card by the referee for making a challenge
on his opponent, but he looks angry with
the decision.

Mathias Fernandez-Pardo (Lille) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Romain
Lissorgue had an easy-decision to make.

Marius Broholm goes off the pitch and Hamza
Igamane (Lille) comes on.

Goal! Hamza Igamane plays a simple square
pass into the feet of Romain Perraud (Lille)
in the box, who composes himself and lashes
the ball low into the middle of the goal.
0:1.

Felix Correia produces a sweet pass and
picks out Mathias Fernandez-Pardo (Lille)
inside the box. He quickly takes a shot
which goes into the middle of the net and
leaves the goalkeeper helpless. He makes
it 0:2!

It must be a yellow card. It is. Benjamin
Andre (Lille) receives the caution after
an awful tackle.

Sambou Soumano (Lorient) has a great chance
to score from the penalty. He shoots to
the bottom left corner, but Berke Ozer leaps
out to thwart his attempt.

Goal - 1:2! Sambou Soumano laid the ball
off to Aiyegun Tosin (Lorient), who slots
it into the back of the net from close range,
leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

Substitution. Aiyegun Tosin makes way for
Noah Cadiou (Lorient).

Here is a change. Sambou Soumano is going
off and Olivier Pantaloni gives the last
tactical orders to Mohamed Bamba (Lorient).

Romain Perraud (Lille) shouldn't be surprised
it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the
situation down well.

Laurent Abergel (Lorient) will have to be
careful for the rest of the match as he
is shown a yellow card.

Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted
a chance to a lurking Mathias Fernandez-Pardo
(Lille), who keeps his cool and rolls the
ball into the net from close range. 1:3.

Hamza Igamane (Lille) gets to the rebound
in the goalmouth and plants a header home.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Theo Le Bris (Lorient)
will replace Arthur Avom.

Olivier Pantaloni decides to make a substitution.
Arsene Kouassi will be replaced by Darlin
Yongwa (Lorient).

Substitution. Felix Correia did his best
and is replaced by Nabil Bentaleb (Lille).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Osame
Sahraoui (Lille) for Mathias Fernandez-Pardo.

Substitution. Aissa Mandi (Lille) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Thomas Meunier walks
off.

Goal! Romain Perraud plays in Hakon Arnar
Haraldsson (Lille), who shows great determination
to get to the ball before a couple of defenders
and from inside the box slots it into the
bottom right corner 1:5.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Ayyoub Bouaddi walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Ugo Raghouber (Lille).

Goal! Hamza Igamane (Lille) scores after
an assist by Benjamin Andre that allowed
him to tap in the ball into an empty net.
The score is 1:6.

Goal! Osame Sahraoui (Lille) weaves his
way past opponents, and he unleashes a magnificent
effort from the edge of the box into the
bottom left corner. Bingourou Kamara had
no chance of reaching it. The score is 1:7.

Goal! Kamory Doumbia shows great vision
to find Mama Balde (Brest) with a cheeky
pass inside the box, and his first-time
shot is precise and sails into the bottom
left corner. 0:1.

Ludovic Ajorque (Brest) shouldn't be surprised
it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the
situation down well.

That will be all from Deiver Machado who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Samson
Baidoo (Lens).

Hugo Magnetti (Brest) commits a foul and
is shown a yellow card without any hesitation
from the referee.

Radoslaw Majecki (Brest) is sent off after
deserving nothing other than a red card
from a referee for clattering into his opponent!

The referee can't ignore those comments
and Kenny Lala (Brest) sees a yellow card
for bad language.

Eric Roy has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Gregoire Coudert (Brest) replacing
Romain Del Castillo.

Goal! Gregoire Coudert gets a hand on the
penalty from Florian Thauvin (Lens), but
can't stop it from flying into the bottom
right corner.

Ruben Aguilar (Lens) is cautioned by the
referee for a foul that he committed a little
earlier.

Justin Bourgault (Brest) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Kamory Doumbia.

Eric Roy prepares a substitution. Mama Balde
is replaced by Hamidou Makalou (Brest).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rayan Fofana leaves the
pitch and Morgan Guilavogui (Lens) comes
on.

Florian Thauvin goes off the pitch and Anthony
Bermont (Lens) comes on.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Saud Abdulhamid (Lens)
will replace Ruben Aguilar.

Goal! Morgan Guilavogui (Lens) picks up
the ball from a rebound and from the edge
of the box he unleashes a low shot into
the bottom left corner. Gregoire Coudert
is unable to keep the ball out of the net.
It's 2:1.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Joris Chotard trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Serigne Diop
(Brest).

Eric Roy has decided to make a change. Raphael
Le Guen (Brest) replaces Bradley Locko.

Adrien Thomasson (Lens) latches on to a
precise pass deep inside the box from Saud
Abdulhamid, and he beats the goalkeeper
with a low accurate shot into the bottom
left corner. He makes it 3:1.

Today's match ends for Wesley Said who will
be replaced by Florian Sotoca (Lens).

Bruno Genesio is forced to make a change.
Ngalayel Mukau (Lille) is not able to carry
on due to injury. He is replaced by Mathias
Fernandez-Pardo.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Jordan Teze leaves the pitch
and Vanderson (Monaco) comes on.

Takumi Minamino (Monaco) goes off the pitch
and Mika Biereth comes on.

It is time for a substitution. Eliesse Ben
Seghir is on for Aleksandr Golovin (Monaco).

Bruno Genesio has decided to substitute
Felix Correia and he is replaced by Nabil
Bentaleb (Lille).

The referee signals a substitution. Kassoum
Ouattara (Monaco) is brought on as a substitute
for Caio Henrique.

Nabil Bentaleb (Lille) receives a yellow
card from the referee, but it seems like
a very harsh decision.

It's like he was asking for a caution. Lamine
Camara (Monaco) receives a yellow card.

GOAL! Superb work from Mathias Fernandez-Pardo,
who plays a vital role in the build-up.
He squares it to Olivier Giroud (Lille),
who beats Lukas Hradecky with a brilliant
shot into the top of the net. 1:0.

Christian Mawissa (Monaco) picks up a yellow
card.

Olivier Giroud (Lille) fails to score from
the penalty kick. His shot goes just a few
inches over the crossbar.

Yanis Zouaoui (Le Havre) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Guillaume Paradis
had an easy-decision to make.

Goal! Wesley Said (Lens) wins the battle
of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty
past Mory Diaw into the bottom left corner.

Ally Samatta (Le Havre) goes into the book
for bad language. His vulgar comments could
have made it worse. Luckily for him, it's
a yellow card.

Goal! Wesley Said shows great vision to
find Rayan Fofana (Lens) with a cheeky pass
inside the box, and his first-time shot
is precise and sails into the bottom left
corner. 0:2.

Fode Doucoure (Le Havre) picks it up in
space and from the edge of the box lashes
in a shot that is deflected past the helpless
Robin Risser. 1:2.

Guillaume Paradis shows a yellow card to
Arouna Sangante (Le Havre) for his blatant
foul.

Mamadou Sangare (Lens) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Fode Sylla.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Adrien Thomasson (Lens) was quite harsh
and Guillaume Paradis didn't hesitate to
show him a yellow card.

Didier Digard has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Younes Namli (Le Havre) replacing
Fode Doucoure.

The substitution is prepared. Abdoulaye
Toure (Le Havre) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Rassoul Ndiaye.

Didier Digard decides to make a substitution.
Ally Samatta will be replaced by Felix Mambimbi
(Le Havre).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Florian Sotoca (Lens)
will replace Florian Thauvin.

Here is a change. Rayan Fofana is going
off and Pierre Sage gives the last tactical
orders to Morgan Guilavogui (Lens).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Godson Kyeremeh (Le Havre)
replaces Yassine Kechta.

Didier Digard has decided to substitute
Arouna Sangante and he is replaced by Simon
Ebonog (Le Havre).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Andrija Bulatovic (Lens)
is coming onto the pitch as Wesley Said
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Chidozie Awaziem (Nantes) receives a yellow
card from the referee for a foul that he
committed a little earlier.

Andrew Omobamidele is substituted due to
injury. Liam Rosenior gives a chance to
Valentin Barco (Strasbourg).

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Liam Rosenior probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Sebastian Nanasi. He is replaced by Emanuel
Emegha (Strasbourg).

This is a yellow card! Francis Coquelin
(Nantes) is not happy with the decision,
but from our point of view it was clear.

Substitution. Bahereba Guirassy is replaced
by Matthis Abline (Nantes).

Luis Castro has decided to make a change.
Hyeok-Kyu Kwon (Nantes) replaces Francis
Coquelin.

A substitution has been made. Kendry Paez
is replaced by Diego Moreira (Strasbourg).

Here is a change. Samir El Mourabet is going
off and Liam Rosenior gives the last tactical
orders to Dilane Bakwa (Strasbourg).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Ismael Doukoure (Strasbourg) was quite
harsh and Bastien Dechepy didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Luis Castro prepares a substitution. Louis
Leroux is replaced by Hyun-Seok Hong (Nantes).

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Felix Lemarechal as
he is replaced by Rafael Luis (Strasbourg).

Goal! Dilane Bakwa produces a brilliant
lofted pass and Emanuel Emegha (Strasbourg)
gets on the end of it to finish with a header
into an empty net. The score is 1:0.

Johann Lepenant will be replaced by Dehmaine
Tabibou (Nantes).

The referee signals a substitution. Youssef
El Arabi (Nantes) is brought on as a substitute
for Yassine Benhattab.

The yellow card goes to Joaquin Panichelli
(Strasbourg).

Goal! Frank Magri (Toulouse) fires the rebound
into the bottom left corner after the ball
breaks to him in the box. The score is 1:0.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Warren
Kamanzi (Toulouse) for Mario Sauer.

Brendan Chardonnet (Brest) is rightly booked
by the referee because it could not have
been anything other than a yellow card.

Goal! Frank Magri (Toulouse) was in the
right place at the right time to get to
the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the left post.
It's 2:0.

Rasmus Nicolaisen (Toulouse) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Djibril Sidibe.

Carles Martinez has decided to make a change.
Noah Edjouma (Toulouse) replaces Yann Gboho.

Eric Roy has decided to substitute Hugo
Magnetti and he is replaced by Joris Chotard
(Brest).

Substitution. Brendan Chardonnet makes his
way off the pitch and Michel Diaz Jr. (Brest)
comes on as his replacement.

Substitution. Hamidou Makalou (Brest) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Romain Del Castillo
walks off.

Eric Roy decides to make a substitution.
Kamory Doumbia will be replaced by Axel
Camblan (Brest).

Here's the change. Frank Magri leaves the
pitch and Santiago Hidalgo (Toulouse) comes
on as a substitute.

Here is a change. Dayann Methalie is going
off and Carles Martinez gives the last tactical
orders to Mathis Saka (Toulouse).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Serigne Diop (Brest)
comes onto the pitch so that Mama Balde
can be given a rest.

Mahdi Camara (Rennes) reacts stupidly and
the referee shows him a deserved red card!

The game is interrupted as Christopher Wooh
(Rennes) is sent off by the referee.

Habib Beye has decided to make a change.
Mahamadou Nagida (Rennes) replaces Mohamed
Meite.

Dermane Karim (Lorient) makes a bad tackle
on his opponent and is angry when the referee
shows him a deserved yellow card.

The game is interrupted. Formose Mendy (Lorient)
is given a yellow card. He has to be more
careful now.

Sambou Soumano (Lorient) receives a yellow
card from the referee as expected.

Goal! Arthur Avom plays a pass to the feet
of Sambou Soumano (Lorient) and he shoots
low into the back of the net from inside
the box. It's 1:0.

Olivier Pantaloni has decided to make a
substitution during the half-time break.
Abdoulaye Faye (Lorient) comes on the pitch
for Formose Mendy.

Aiyegun Tosin (Lorient) meets the well-taken
corner kick and fires the ball in the left
side of the net. What a goal!

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Sambou Soumano as
he is replaced by Mohamed Bamba (Lorient).

Olivier Pantaloni prepares a substitution.
Dermane Karim is replaced by Pablo Pagis
(Lorient).

Habib Beye decides to make a substitution.
Ludovic Blas will be replaced by Ibrahim
Salah (Rennes).

Fabian Rieder comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Djaoui Cisse (Rennes).

Pablo Pagis (Lorient) scores as he latches
on to a pass inside the penalty box and
fires a perfect low strike, which goes inside
the left post.

A substitution has been made. Aiyegun Tosin
goes off and Theo Le Bris (Lorient) comes
on.

Theo Le Bris (Lorient) gets to a rebound
inside the six-yard box and produces a header.
He manages to put the ball into the bottom
right corner, and thus alter the score to
4:0.

This is a yellow card! Arsene Kouassi (Lorient)
is not happy with the decision, but from
our point of view it was clear.

Here is a change. Mahamadou Nagida is going
off and Habib Beye gives the last tactical
orders to Alidu Seidu (Rennes).

The game has come to an end for Arsene Kouassi.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Darlin Yongwa (Lorient).

Panos Katseris (Lorient) makes it easy for
the referee to show him a yellow card.

The referee is firm and issues Laurent Abergel
(Lorient) a deserved yellow card.

Pavel Sulc feeds the ball through to Malick
Fofana (Lyon), who picks up the pass inside
the box and quickly sends it into the bottom
left corner! The goalkeeper was helpless.
1:0!

Goal! Ainsley Maitland-Niles displays great
vision and sends a pass to Corentin Tolisso
(Lyon), who shows brilliant composure inside
the box to bury the ball from close range
in the back of the net. The score is 2:0.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Alpha
Toure (Metz) for Urie-Michel Mboula.

Boubacar Traore (Metz) is shown a deserved
yellow card for saying too much to the referee.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Ibou Sane (Metz) is coming
onto the pitch as Georgiy Tsitaishvili cannot
continue after picking up an injury.

Stephane Le Mignan has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Morgan Bokele Mputu (Metz)
replacing Giorgi Abuashvili.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Pavel Sulc trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Adam Karabec (Lyon).

Jorge Maciel has decided to substitute Corentin
Tolisso and he is replaced by Khalis Merah
(Lyon).

It will be a substitution. Nicolas Tagliafico
(Lyon) is ready to enter the pitch as Abner
Vinicius walks off.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Brian Madjo departs the
field of play to be replaced by Idrissa
Gueye (Metz).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Koffi Kouao (Metz) was quite harsh and
Eric Wattellier didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Goal! Adam Karabec (Lyon) was in the right
place at the right time to get to the rebound
inside the box and gleefully rifles the
ball low inside the right post. It's 3:0.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Ruben Kluivert (Lyon) is replacing Clinton
Mata.

Here is a change. Malick Fofana is going
off and Jorge Maciel gives the last tactical
orders to Afonso Moreira (Lyon).

Jeremie Boga (Nice) meets a perfect cross
from Tom Louchet deep inside the box and
controls it with a nice first touch. He
produces an accurate strike inside the left
post. It's 1:0.

Goal! Ibrahim Osman plays a pass to the
feet of Lassine Sinayoko (Auxerre), and
he shoots into the bottom left corner from
inside the box. It's 1:1.

What bad luck! Clement Akpa (Auxerre) got
in the way of a pass and unintentionally
sent the ball past his own goalkeeper. The
score is 2:1.

Jeremy Stinat has issued a yellow card to
Isak Jansson (Nice).

Jeremy Stinat shows a yellow card to Francisco
Sierralta (Auxerre) for his blatant foul.

Donovan Leon (Auxerre) takes out his opponent
with a nasty slide tackle and receives a
straight red card from the referee!

Christophe Pelissier has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Theo De Percin (Auxerre)
replacing Gabriel Osho.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Marvin Senaya (Auxerre) was quite harsh
and Jeremy Stinat didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Kojo Peprah (Nice) picks up a yellow card
for an infringement.

Substitution. Danny Namaso (Auxerre) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Ibrahim Osman walks
off.

Franck Haise has decided to substitute Salis
Abdul Samed and he is replaced by Pablo
Rosario (Nice).

Here comes a substitution. Sofiane Diop
(Nice) is brought on as a substitute for
Isak Jansson.

Substitution. Kevin leaves the pitch and
is replaced by Terem Moffi (Nice).

Franck Haise prepares a substitution. Jeremie
Boga is replaced by Badredine Bouanani (Nice).

A substitution has been made. Gideon Mensah
is replaced by Fredrik Oppegard (Auxerre).

The substitution has been made. Lasso Coulibaly
(Auxerre) has replaced Lassine Sinayoko.

Here is a change. Marvin Senaya is going
off and Christophe Pelissier gives the last
tactical orders to Lamine Sy (Auxerre).

Goal! Tom Louchet hands Terem Moffi (Nice)
the simplest of tasks from close range after
the cross evaded the keeper, and he makes
no mistake with his header into the middle
of the goal. 3:1.

Substitution. Tom Louchet did his best and
is replaced by Hamza Koutoune (Nice).

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Mason Greenwood (Marseille) low into
the right of the net, giving goalkeeper
Obed Nkambadio no chance!

It's a goal! Mason Greenwood delivers a
teasing cross from the resulting corner
and the ball falls into the space where
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Marseille) is
lurking. His precise shot from close range
goes straight into the bottom left corner
and it's 2:0.

Ilan Kebbal (Paris FC) finishes his beautiful
individual effort with a superb strike from
inside the box. Geronimo Rulli is just a
bystander as the ball flies into the top
left corner. The score is 2:1.

It's in the back of the net! Ilan Kebbal
slips the ball through to Moses Simon (Paris
FC), and he darts into the box to unleash
a magnificent low shot into the back of
the net. He makes it 2:2.

Substitution. Bilal Nadir (Marseille) has
come on for Timothy Weah.

Stephane Gilli has decided to make a change.
Jean-Philippe Krasso (Paris FC) replaces
Moses Simon.

Substitution. Alimani Gory (Paris FC) replaces
Willem Geubbels.

A substitution has been made. Adama Camara
is replaced by Lohann Doucet (Paris FC).

Goal! Some very poor defending from the
opponent allows Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang
(Marseille) the chance to get to the edge
of the box and he makes no mistake with
a lovely finish. It's 3:2.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang will be replaced
by Robinio Vaz (Marseille).

What an absolute cracking goal! Pierre-Emile
Hojbjerg (Marseille) hits a perfect volley
from long range and the ball flies into
the bottom left corner. Take a bow son.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Vincent Marchetti trots
off the pitch and is replaced by Pierre-Yves
Hamel (Paris FC).

Stephane Gilli prepares a substitution.
Nhoa Sangui is replaced by Julien Lopez
(Paris FC).

Mason Greenwood (Marseille) can't convert
the spot kick. It goes narrowly wide of
the left post.

Robinio Vaz (Marseille) violates the rules
and gets a yellow card.

Roberto De Zerbi has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Derek Cornelius (Marseille)
replacing Ulisses Garcia.

The game has come to an end for Amine Gouiri.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Darryl Bakola (Marseille).

It’s a GOAL! It looked impossible to score
from that angle, but Robinio Vaz (Marseille)
somehow finds the net with a cheeky shot
past the keeper from close in.

Ousmane Dembele (PSG) misses the penalty!
His poor effort goes well over the crossbar.
The ball is off of the pitch and it's a
goal kick for Angers.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Pierrick
Capelle (Angers) for Marius Courcoul.

Goal! Fabian Ruiz (PSG) was in the right
place at the right time to get to the rebound
inside the box and gleefully rifles the
ball low inside the right post. It's 1:0.

Substitution. Sidiki Cherif is replaced
by Jim Allevinah (Angers).

Luis Enrique decides to make a substitution.
Joao Neves will be replaced by Warren Zaire-Emery
(PSG).

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Bradley Barcola as
he is replaced by Goncalo Ramos (PSG).

Substitution. Jacques Ekomie will be replaced
by Florent Hanin (Angers).

Luis Enrique has decided to substitute Desire
Doue and he is replaced by Ibrahim Mbaye
(PSG).

Substitution. Emmanuel Biumla (Angers) on
for Lilian Raolisoa.

Ousmane Dembele goes off the pitch and Kang-In
Lee (PSG) comes on.

Alexandre Dujeux has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Lanroy Machine (Angers)
replacing Yassine Belkhdim.
Kelvin Amian (Nantes) earns the yellow card.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Bahereba Guirassy
as he is replaced by Matthis Abline (Nantes).

Luis Castro has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Hyun-Seok Hong (Nantes) replacing
Yassine Benhattab.

The substitution has been made. Nuno Mendes
(PSG) has replaced Lucas Hernandez.

A substitution has been made. Fabian Ruiz
is replaced by Achraf Hakimi (PSG).

Luis Enrique decides to make a substitution.
Ibrahim Mbaye will be replaced by Ousmane
Dembele (PSG).

Substitution. Kang-In Lee makes way for
Desire Doue (PSG).

Vitinha (PSG) picks it up in space and from
the edge of the box lashes in a shot that
is deflected past the helpless Anthony Lopes.
0:1.

Here comes the VAR verdict. NO GOAL for
PSG due to an offside in the build-up play.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia
(PSG) is coming onto the pitch as Goncalo
Ramos cannot continue after picking up an
injury.

Here is a change. Hyeok-Kyu Kwon is going
off and Luis Castro gives the last tactical
orders to Francis Coquelin (Nantes).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Amady Camara (Nantes)
will replace Mostafa Mohamed.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Achraf Hakimi (PSG) was quite harsh and
Benoit Bastien didn't hesitate to show him
a yellow card.

Louis Leroux goes off the pitch and Dehmaine
Assoumani (Nantes) comes on.

It's a goal! Esteban Lepaul (Angers) scores
with a brilliant shot into the bottom right
corner after being released inside the box
by a superb lofted pass from Jordan Lefort.
The score is now 1:0.

Lohann Doucet (Paris FC) has to be very
careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

Francois Letexier shows a yellow card to
Yassine Belkhdim (Angers) for his blatant
foul.

Louis Mouton (Angers) makes a horror tackle
on his opponent and receives a red card
from the referee!

Stephane Gilli has decided to make a change.
Alimani Gory (Paris FC) replaces Jean-Philippe
Krasso.

Stephane Gilli prepares a substitution.
Lohann Doucet is replaced by Vincent Marchetti
(Paris FC).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Lanroy Machine (Angers)
comes onto the pitch so that Sidiki Cherif
can be given a rest.

Here comes a substitution. Jim Allevinah
(Angers) is brought on as a substitute for
Lilian Raolisoa.

Here is a change. Pierre-Yves Hamel is going
off and Stephane Gilli gives the last tactical
orders to Julien Lopez (Paris FC).

Substitution. Moses Simon makes way for
Mathieu Cafaro (Paris FC).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Jacques Ekomie (Angers)
comes onto the pitch for Florent Hanin.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Yassine Belkhdim (Angers) will be replaced
by Marius Courcoul.

Alexandre Dujeux decides to make a substitution.
Esteban Lepaul will be replaced by Prosper
Peter (Angers).

The substitution is prepared. Nouha Dicko
(Paris FC) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Timothee Kolodziejczak.

Carlens Arcus (Angers) receives a yellow
card from the referee for a foul that he
committed a little earlier.

Pablo Pagis (Lorient) has tested the patience
of referee Abdelatif Kherradji and goes
into the book for a previous late challenge.

Igor Silva (Lorient) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Abdelatif Kherradji had
an easy-decision to make.

Goal! Great link up play between Lassine
Sinayoko (Auxerre) and Ibrahim Osman gives
the former a clear sight of goal on the
edge of the box. He doesn't disappoint and
beats the keeper in the top right corner.
1:0.

Abdelatif Kherradji shows a yellow card
to Marvin Senaya (Auxerre) for his blatant
foul.

It will be a substitution. Sambou Soumano
(Lorient) is ready to enter the pitch as
Mohamed Bamba walks off.

Olivier Pantaloni has decided to substitute
Pablo Pagis and he is replaced by Dermane
Karim (Lorient).

The substitution is prepared. Panos Katseris
(Lorient) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Joel Mvuka Mugisha.

Josue Casimir (Auxerre) misses the penalty
as he smashes the ball against the crossbar!

We are about to witness a subsitution. Darlin
Yongwa (Lorient) for Arsene Kouassi.

Substitution. Rudy Matondo (Auxerre) in,
Ibrahim Osman out.

Christophe Pelissier has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Lasso Coulibaly (Auxerre)
replacing Josue Casimir.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Elisha Owusu (Auxerre) was quite harsh
and Abdelatif Kherradji didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

The referee signals a substitution. Theo
Bair (Auxerre) is brought on as a substitute
for Lassine Sinayoko.

Christophe Pelissier prepares a substitution.
Gideon Mensah is replaced by Fredrik Oppegard
(Auxerre).

Fredrik Oppegard (Auxerre) violates the
laws of the game and is shown a yellow card
by the referee, but it could have been a
straight red as well.

The foul by Mamadou Sarr (Strasbourg) is
worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown
by Mathieu Vernice.

Abdoul Ouattara (Strasbourg) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Mathieu Vernice
had an easy-decision to make.

Liam Rosenior has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Dilane Bakwa (Strasbourg) replacing
Abdoul Ouattara.

Brian Madjo goes off the pitch and Idrissa
Gueye (Metz) comes on.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Jessy Deminguet (Metz) was quite harsh
and Mathieu Vernice didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Koffi Kouao (Metz) tries to convince the
referee to change his mind and receives
a yellow card for dissent.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Samir El Mourabet walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Sebastian Nanasi (Strasbourg).

Stephane Le Mignan decides to make a substitution.
Cheikh Sabaly will be replaced by Ibou Sane
(Metz).

The manager has been forced to make a substitution
and the injured Jessy Deminguet (Metz) limps
off the pitch to be replaced by Alpha Toure.

Here is a change. Samuel Amo-Ameyaw is going
off and Liam Rosenior gives the last tactical
orders to Kendry Paez (Strasbourg).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Maxime Colin (Metz) comes
onto the pitch for Koffi Kouao.

Substitution. Boubacar Traore leaves the
pitch and is replaced by Joseph Nduquidi
(Metz).

Goal! Dilane Bakwa is the provider and Joaquin
Panichelli (Strasbourg) is the executioner,
dispatching the cross into the right of
the goal from close in with his head. 0:1.

Goal! Felix Correia shows great vision to
find Olivier Giroud (Lille) with a cheeky
pass inside the box, and his first-time
shot is precise and sails into the bottom
right corner. 0:1.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Nathan Ngoy (Lille) was quite harsh and
Clement Turpin didn't hesitate to show him
a yellow card.

Kamory Doumbia (Brest) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Clement Turpin had an
easy-decision to make.

Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted
a chance to a lurking Hakon Arnar Haraldsson
(Lille), who keeps his cool and rolls the
ball into the net from close range. 0:2.

Goal! Kamory Doumbia (Brest) slots the ball
into an unguarded net from close range after
a shot rebounds off a defender. 1:2.

Brendan Chardonnet (Brest) receives a yellow
card from the referee for a foul that he
committed a little earlier.

Bruno Genesio has made a change at the break.
Mathias Fernandez-Pardo (Lille) has come
on in place of Marius Broholm.

Goal! Mama Balde pulls the ball back for
Kamory Doumbia (Brest) on the edge of the
box, and he beats the keeper with a fine
strike into the top right corner. 2:2.

Ousmane Toure is substituted due to injury.
Bruno Genesio gives a chance to Adeagan
Goffi (Lille).

Goal 2:3! Ngalayel Mukau (Lille) taps home
from close range after the rebound fell
kindly into his path.

A substitution has been made. Romain Perraud
goes off and Vincent Burlet (Lille) comes
on.

A good lofted pass from Kenny Lala finds
Julien Le Cardinal (Brest) on the edge of
the area. He collects the ball and rips
in a wonderful shot which ends up in the
roof of the net. The score is now 3:3.

Nabil Bentaleb (Lille) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Hakon Arnar Haraldsson.

Bruno Genesio has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Ayyoub Bouaddi (Lille) replacing
Ngalayel Mukau.

Substitution. Mama Balde makes his way off
the pitch and Hamidou Makalou (Brest) comes
on as his replacement.

Eric Roy decides to make a substitution.
Kamory Doumbia will be replaced by Luc Zogbe
(Brest).

Jaydee Canvot (Toulouse) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Thomas Leonard didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

Thomas Leonard shows a yellow card to Dayann
Methalie (Toulouse), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

The foul by Mario Sauer (Toulouse) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Thomas Leonard.

Here is a change. Noah Edjouma is going
off and Carles Martinez gives the last tactical
orders to Warren Kamanzi (Toulouse).

The manager makes a subsitution with Alexis
Vossah (Toulouse) coming on for Mario Sauer.

Today's match ends for Frank Magri who will
be replaced by Santiago Hidalgo (Toulouse).

Substitution. Bernard Nguene (Nice) replaces
Terem Moffi.

Franck Haise decides to make a substitution.
Badredine Bouanani will be replaced by Sofiane
Diop (Nice).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Isak Jansson trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Jeremie Boga (Nice).

That will be all from Tom Louchet who is
being replaced by the fresh legs of Salis
Abdul Samed (Nice).

Bernard Nguene (Nice) sees a yellow card
from Thomas Leonard after he sent one of
the opposing players to the ground.

Substitution. Dayann Methalie will be replaced
by Rasmus Nicolaisen (Toulouse).

Djibril Sidibe (Toulouse) finds himself
in a very promising position after getting
on the end of a brilliant pass and fires
the ball inside the right post!

Substitution. Kojo Peprah walks off the
pitch and Billal Brahimi (Nice) comes on
as a substitute.

A yellow card for a tackle by Hicham Boudaoui
(Nice). Thomas Leonard doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

An unfortunate own goal is conceded by Gautier
Lloris (Le Havre), who attempted to block
the ball after a cross, but instead he sends
it under his own crossbar.

Serge Costa has decided to substitute Simon
Ebonog and he is replaced by Ally Samatta
(Le Havre).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Fode Doucoure (Le Havre)
replaces Younes Namli.

Gooal! Lamine Camara takes over corner duties.
Eric Dier (Monaco) gets his head on the
ball from the corner and puts it low into
the middle of the net. 2:0.

Here comes a substitution. Vanderson (Monaco)
is brought on as a substitute for Jordan
Teze.

Adi Hutter prepares a substitution. Lamine
Camara is replaced by Eliesse Ben Seghir
(Monaco).

Rassoul Ndiaye (Le Havre) makes a great
solo run and pulls the trigger from inside
the box, beating Lukas Hradecky with a strike
into the bottom right corner. He makes it
2:1.

It's a goal! Denis Zakaria plays a lovely
pass into the box and finds Maghnes Akliouche
(Monaco). He tries his luck from close range
and coolly strikes the ball into the back
of the net. 3:1.

Arouna Sangante is not able to continue
due to his injury and will be replaced by
Godson Kyeremeh (Le Havre).

Serge Costa has decided to make a change.
Felix Mambimbi (Le Havre) replaces Etienne
Youte Kinkoue.

A substitution has been made. Rassoul Ndiaye
is replaced by Daren Nbenbege Mosengo (Le
Havre).

That's the end of the game for Mika Biereth,
who is replaced by Paris Brunner (Monaco).

Here is a change. Takumi Minamino is going
off and Adi Hutter gives the last tactical
orders to George Ilenikhena (Monaco).

A yellow card for a tackle by Gautier Lloris
(Le Havre). Ruddy Buquet doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Aladji Bamba (Monaco)
comes onto the pitch so that Aleksandr Golovin
can be given a rest.

Samson Baidoo (Lens) sees a yellow card
from Romain Lissorgue after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

Romain Lissorgue shows a yellow card to
Malang Sarr (Lens) for a tough tackle.

Goal! A great through ball by Malick Fofana
sets up Georges Mikautadze (Lyon) inside
the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs
the ball into the left side of the goal.
0:1.

Romain Lissorgue shows the yellow card to
Sael Kumbedi (Lyon) for a heavy challenge.

Substitution. Rayan Fofana did his best
and is replaced by Florian Thauvin (Lens).

Romain Lissorgue shows a yellow card to
Abner Vinicius (Lyon), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Here comes a substitution. Sael Kumbedi
is given a rest as he is replaced by Khalis
Merah (Lyon).

The manager makes a subsitution with Anthony
Bermont (Lens) coming on for Deiver Machado.

Pierre Sage prepares a substitution. Ruben
Aguilar is replaced by Saud Abdulhamid (Lens).

Substitution. Florian Sotoca (Lens) on for
Wesley Said.

That's the end of the game for Georges Mikautadze,
who is replaced by Adam Karabec (Lyon).

Paulo Fonseca has decided to make a change.
Pavel Sulc (Lyon) replaces Malick Fofana.

A yellow card for a tackle by Adam Karabec
(Lyon). Romain Lissorgue doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Jeremie Pignard shows a yellow card to Adrien
Rabiot (Marseille) for his blatant foul.

Mousa Tamari (Rennes) talks out of turn
to the referee and subsequently receives
a yellow card. His behaviour towards the
referee was not friendly. He should be thankful,
it could have been much worse!

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Christopher Wooh (Rennes)
replaces Mohamed Meite.

Roberto De Zerbi makes a switch. Timothy
Weah is coming on in place of Geoffrey Kondogbia
(Marseille) at the start of the second period.

Roberto De Zerbi prepares a substitution.
Jonathan Rowe is replaced by Pierre-Emerick
Aubameyang (Marseille).

Substitution. Fabian Rieder walks off the
pitch and Mahdi Camara (Rennes) comes on
as a substitute.

Michael Murillo will be replaced by Ulisses
Garcia (Marseille).

Ulisses Garcia (Marseille) makes a bad challenge
on his opponent and is booked by the referee.

A substitution has been made. Mousa Tamari
is replaced by Ibrahim Salah (Rennes).

Habib Beye has decided to make a change.
Mahamadou Nagida (Rennes) replaces Przemyslaw
Frankowski.

Substitution. Seko Fofana leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Ludovic Blas (Rennes).

It's time for a substitution. Darryl Bakola
(Marseille) comes on in place of Angel Gomes.

Valentin Rongier (Rennes) is shown a deserved
yellow card for saying too much to the referee.

Ludovic Blas (Rennes) has acres of space
after latching on to a precise pass into
the box. He doesn't hesitate to unleash
a great effort which ends up in the bottom
left corner.

Leonardo Balerdi (Marseille) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Jeremie Pignard
had an easy-decision to make.
